website_summaries.verdict: Nice looking design with curved legs and rails. This crib is convertible to a day bed frame when the child grows up.
pros: Pretty easy to set up and put together
Interesting design with curved support legs and side rails
Meets all of the ASTM safety standards
Great crib size to place in any room where it's needed
cons: Some problems with consistent stain color in the wood

customer_reviews.title: Cosleeper perfect
customer_reviews.text: The answer to my cosleeping needs. Used straps to attach it to the bed frame. I have a tall mattress so I had to figure out how to raise it to be level. I just happened to have a bench part go my bedroom set that when I sat the crib on top (3” mattress) made it perfectly level with the top of my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: lavero

customer_reviews.title: Amazon/seller should note warning
customer_reviews.text: After unpacking the crib and reading the directions, I was hit with a bold warning: No mattress over 2" thick is to be used in this crib. No explanation as to why. This is upsetting because Amazon didn't note the warning, nor did any previous reviewers. I'm perplexed and without a mattress. My granddaughter will have to sleep on the thin pad that comes with the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Babz23

customer_reviews.title: Baby X loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this lil crib its really cute. Bought for my daughters first baby! It doesnt take up much room at all. Measurements were accurate. Mattress fit well. I thought the price point was a little high being in a mini crib, but after further search I realize it was about average. I would definitely recommend this crib if you haven't got a lot of space. I purchased this crib with my own coins it's not sponsored
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib, mine came in perfect condition without any damage or missing parts. I am not giving it 5 stars because it came with the wrong instructions but the makers of the crib have the instructions on their website so if you have this issue go to the Dream on me website and you can download the instructions to any of their cribs. It really is a beautiful piece of furniture. It did take my husband 2 hours to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: DressLadyYessy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute crib for a really good price! I was going between buying a mini crib or a bassinet so the baby could sleep in our room and landed on the mini crib. The price is pretty equal to a decent bassinet when you add the mattress but I feel the crib will be a lot more secure and most bassinets only last until baby is around 6 months or able to pull themselves up where this will last until about 1 1/2 years in crib form then can switch into a toddler bed. I'll be able to get so much more use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: We love the mini crib
customer_reviews.text: This is made with cheap, not real wood, but at this price point it’s understandable. We love the mini crib! We have one rail off and slide it up to our bed and use it as a cosleeper. And when baby is done using it our we will use the day bed for our dogs
customer_reviews.author: Vanilly

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this mini crib, this is my third baby and I needed a crib that fit the only little space I have in my room, and this is exactly what I needed! Very good quality also! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Alba A

customer_reviews.title: ... fits what used to be my walk-in closet just fine, I'm just not sure if it's gonna be ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fits what used to be my walk-in closet just fine, I'm just not sure if it's gonna be enough for our little one or we're gonna need a bigger crib soon. My LO is 4 months old and he pretty much fills the whole crib, his head and toes hit the shorter sides of the crib when I put him in that position so I am kind of skeptical about whether or not it's gonna be comfortable him when he gets older
customer_reviews.author: Ragda

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a Small Space
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the standard size crib was just too big for my city bedroom. It's a great size, and is quite sturdy - it survived a transatlantic move without much more than a scratch or two from packing/unpacking. So far my two year old is fine in it, though if she has a growth spurt soon I might finally have to give up and buy a bigger bed. Easy to put together and it's got an interesting shape and style without being too ornate.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti Sethi

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this due to us having twins we thought the mini crib would be good for the space since we had to put two cribs and other things in the room not worth the money you can buy a bigger size crib for the same price finding a mattress and crib sheets is very hard for it and my child is already 9 months old and is outgrowing the crib. We ended up buying one full-sized crib we are selling this one to buy another full size crib my nine-month-old is a mess as big as a day and crib not worth the money at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with limited space
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for small spaces. My son out grew his bassinet and this is the same size as a play pen. It all goes together with an allen wrench and is great... definitely requires a separate purchase of mattress the pad it comes with is like a sleeping bag thickness...
customer_reviews.author: Kara chico

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib! Looks great and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this crib! It’s so cute and looks so nice, and best of all, my grand baby sleeps well in it. Note- you need to buy a mattress for mini cribs as this comes with a little pad. We got a dream on me for $27 on Amazon and put the pad right over it and we have a firm mattress with a nice cushion. All around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T Payne

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and comfortable for the little one .
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to save space in your room I highly recommend this product. It was better than I had anticipated it to be. I was absolutely satisfied with this purchase and it was perfect for my 8 month old and spacious. However, you will need to buy two additional Dream on Me mattress to make it work and more comfortable for the baby. The one that came with the crib is too slim and does not provide enough cushion. Overall, my money was well spent and invested.
customer_reviews.author: Sivilay Chansy Hap

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini crib! It's built great and came without any damage and really easy to build! My daughter loves it and so do I! It's perfect for the space we needed it for! Would definitely recommend this mini crib if you need a beautiful well built crib for small spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Riley

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 1 to assemble, BEAUTIFUL, super durable, easy to change into "big girl" bed too!!
customer_reviews.text: Had the crib for almost 4 years, used as a toddler bed (No front rail) for about 1.5 years now. Put it together 8 moths preggo, by myself-who needs to wait for help?!? lol I maybe should have. BUT, it wasn't as hard (at all) as other cribs I've put together! Love the design, the finish has held up really well, even through the "imma naw my way outta this prison" phase. Changing to the toddler bed seriously took like 10 mins. And that was just cuz i needed to read the directions again. ha! VERY easy. Perfect size too, just what we needed. Buy this crib. Seriously. If they made "adult sized" beds, I'd 99.9% get one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: My Baby Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were kind of annoying and the mattress came with it was definitely too thin. I'm happy that I got a different one from reading the reviews before I bought this. The crib is very sturdy my 10mo. old loves it. It's a great buy, I should of just bought mini cribs from the beginning instead of pack and plays because those mattress pad things wore down so quick. If you thinking about getting this crib, buy it 🥰🙂 Oh and we went with the "Dream On Me" extra firm mattress, it's OK for a newborn but I might get something softer but it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful bed and good quality too. Bought this bed for my grandbaby. I would reccomend buying a separate mattress as the one that comes with it is useless. I bought a 3" memory foam mattress- sized for mini-cribs. Love this crib and definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini crib. We had major issues putting it together because we got confused with the screws haha. The mattress it comes with us sooooo thin, definitely buy one. It also states the mattress dimensions needed- I posted a photo of for anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn*Aries*Virgo

customer_reviews.title: Invest in the thicker mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this smaller crib because I wasn’t ready to put my baby in her own room. Fits great in my room and makes it easier when you have to get up at night. Sturdy and roomy. Did purchase the additional thicker mattress though. The pad that comes with it is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrianne

customer_reviews.title: I love these minicribs
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dream On Me minicrib I've purchased. The first is still being used by my 2 y/o grandson so we bought another for his new sister.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Heavy burden
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice crib. I have triplett grandbabies on the way so ordered three of them in espresso. Imagine my dissapointment when one of them is black. It is clearly maked on the box that it is black. Now i have to lug it to return it and get the right one. The purpose of online ordering is convenient delivery. This is no longer convenient
customer_reviews.author: Robin Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini crib!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift from my sister. Very easy to assemble. Great quality so far and the dimensions are perfect for our room. Also recognized the 2 in limitation on the mattress, but were able to figure that out thanks to previous reviews. Otherwise I think that would have been a major hindrance to getting this product.
customer_reviews.author: priteshkumar b mistry

customer_reviews.title: Came with a lot of damage and it wasn't done during shipping i can tell
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience with this shouldnt have nor did it need to ne this difficult...it came damages with marks on a few parts well quite a few marks on the entire crib I really don't appreciate that it's not like I spend $20 on this thing and it shouldn't be damaged in at least five places that I've spotted
customer_reviews.author: Lanna Hea

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!
customer_reviews.text: Great mini-crib! Very sturdy and nice to look at! Don’t get the 5” spring mattress for it though, it will balloon up and create an unsafe sleep environment for your baby. I had to return the mattress and get the 3” one and it fits perfectly! Very happy and super affordable
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for compact nursery’s or Co sleeping spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini crib so much. I needed a crib to go into my baby girls small sized nursery and this crib was the perfect fit. It was so easy to put together and is extremely sturdy if assembled properly. I love the design and the color, it was everything I wanted. It came with a thin mattress so I purchased the Dream On Me mini mattress for extra comfort and my daughter sleeps like an angel.
customer_reviews.author: EVOLVE2EXIST

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, easy to assemble and fits small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We have a smaller bedroom and a toddler in a larger bed so this is similar in style and color to our bedroom set and it fits very well. The height is adjustable and our 4 month old sleeps well in here. I would recommend a bumper but it takes some back and forth as they are made for standard cribs and have to be snugly woven and tied for safety.
customer_reviews.author: caveman442

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased 2 dream on me mini cribs, the first one was a DOM addison and had to return it because it was missing pieces. Once returned and the refund was refunded to my account we ordered the DOM violet crib and the wooden platform where the mattress rests on was split in half!! I do NOT reccomend DREAM ON ME products at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alec yanish

customer_reviews.title: Great lil crib
customer_reviews.text: Our baby hated sleeping in the pack and play so we got this to try instead and she sleeps much better in it! It’s a great size for our bedroom. We purchased a mattress to go inside this cause the one it comes with is so this!!
customer_reviews.author: tawnya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this crib!!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this crib for about 5 months now and I love it so much! It’s super cute and also sturdy. We needed a mini crib because our bedroom is small and this fits perfectly next to our bed. It was easy to put together and it doesn’t wobble at all. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Small but still should be enough room (my 18 month fits in it) fits perfectly in the small space I have. Light weight, easy to put together (I'm pregnant and was able to get it done and moved by myself). Only thing I had a problem with was I had the wrong item shipped to me the 1st time but got the correct one the 2nd time and not all the parts were labelled.
customer_reviews.author: Kera

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look and feel. I wish the gray was the same cost as the others but for me it’s still worth it. It’d be even greater if it were as cheap as the other colors. It’s sturdy and the wood and materials used are safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a daycare and have two of these and love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is about the size of a pack n play but looks so much nicer. I have a daycare and have two of these and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fuller

customer_reviews.title: They dont understand the difference between open box, and used.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The description of this stated open/damaged box, condition very good. So based off that I assumed it wasn't used. Unfortunately not only was it not just an open box it was also used, the end pieces were put on backwards , damaging the outside finish, and left indents in the wood. It was also missing a Burrell nut. Might be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby to Toddler Crib
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very sturdy after it's finalized in construction. It's a good price, due to the fact that it grows with your child from baby to toddler. I didn't care for the mattress and purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Lady T.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: Little time to put together, exactly as described and perfect for the small space we had to cram this into!
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Limited space, decided to go with a mini crib . This is amazing. I love it. It was easy for me to assemble. And at 1year old now. He still fits perfectly. But, he is a short lil guy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sammie .B

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Missing an entire side of it. How does that even happen?! Obviously cannot put it together without an entire side panel. Put in a return and it's telling me it'll be here Friday. It's Saturday. Should be a lot sooner considering it's their mistake.
customer_reviews.author: KellyP.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and good quality for the price. Perfect for the in between stage for our baby - between bassinet and a crib in her own room.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute little crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our needs and relatively quick to put together, though not easy to do with just one person. Only complaint is that one leg arrived with some scratches/cosmetic damage. But nothing too major.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Receive it with scratches and crack
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. When I opened the box, I found many scratches in addition to a crack on one of the sides....
customer_reviews.author: Naoufal Lakhssassi

customer_reviews.title: Best space saving crib!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful sturdy crib and fit in our small place nicely. I did order another mattress for the crib because the one that came with it was pretty thin. I had it put together by myself in a little over 1hr. Everything was marked with letters on it so there was no second guessing on what piece went where. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Boy mom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Showed up without screws and other hardware. Waiting on shipment of screws and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: redman76

customer_reviews.title: Mini Crib
customer_reviews.text: The crib is awesome. It’s looks great in person. Took about an hour to put it together. Very sturdy and well made. Perfect size for the space I needed it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kap430

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: There was an instruction book, but no letter or number stickers on anything to label which piece is what. The base board that the mattress lays on is cracked on two of the corners also.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Best Mini Crib Choice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mini crib is PERFECT! It is easy to assemble and comes with all the instructions and tools to do so. It comes with a 1” inch mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: TOBY

customer_reviews.title: Small fit and neat!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and the size. I have small bedroom and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Faheema

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks nice. Daughter seems to enjoy sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Missing a side. I returned the product. Called manufacturer and they told me it would take three days to see if they can locate a spare part. I was shocked they wanted me to wait days to find out if they had the part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like This Crib!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is light in weight but sturdy. It was also easy to assemble, my fiance didn't even take 30 full minutes to put it together. Also it does not take up a lot of space, which was a plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Dream On Me customer service was not helpful at all.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in this crib as mattress that was recommended did not fit. When I called Dream On Me company for assistance, they were of No help!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Very small: for a mini mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is for a mini mattress. We had to return. There’s no way our mattress would fit. It doesn’t say that anywhere on the listing. Make sure you measure everything before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Check the screws bag to if you have the right screws
customer_reviews.text: I still gave it five stars because I do like it but some of the screws sizes was wrong to set up one size of the crib I thought it was my mistake so I took it apart to check all of the screws but it wasn’t my mistake
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Puzzling Assembly
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful but some parts are missing and some of the holes are missing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Agerbeek

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of review's and we ended up with thia crib. It was a good value for the price and fits easily in our smaller room next to the bed. Cute design and wasn't that hard to put together. Just make sure you know the difference between all the screws before assemble. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: david bonilla irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was very easy to assemble. It is sturdy and good
customer_reviews.author: alfred j

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modern
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the newborn as a starter crib! My grand baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for small apartment the crib looks really nice I like it !
customer_reviews.author: hila

customer_reviews.title: We love this crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib. Perfect size fits in our closet. No sense in getting a huge crib that they don't even need that large.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Venable

customer_reviews.title: Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This crib was bought as a baby gift.but when opened it was the biggest scratched up cheap mess with pieces missing..l Put it out to the trash...would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Never had a mini crib before but I really like this. It's very cute and looks nice. Much preferred to the bigger bulkier cribs.
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and cute! The only reason I have it 4 stars was due to it being a little difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: This crib is the perfect size. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. I bought it for my newborn, but he is still in the bassinet. My almost two year old took to it. I may need to buy another one! You will need to invest in a separate mattress. I chose the 3 inch. This is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: most of the crib went together great, the side rails on each side would not screw into one of the ends so i ended up superglueing the pieces to the legs but even that didnt completely fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much room at my place. My daughter and I are currently sharing a small bedroom until her room is ready. Perfect fit, stylish, affordable, happy mama, happy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Cute crib!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little crib! Very easy to put together and sturdy! I would definitely recommend this crib to anyone!! However I do suggest to buy a better mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Bottom 4 bolts are too short
customer_reviews.text: Bolts at the bottom on each side are too short sucks I need this ASAP for my baby and have to wai
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. It's the perfect size for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far will update when baby come to 5 stars if still awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love my crib! Came earlier then expected which was awesome. I was little nervous due to some of the reviews regarding the crib missing pieces and no instructions. My crib came with no damage, all the pieces including the screws. My boyfriend set up with no problem🤔. Of course I’ll be purchasing a different mattress. But overall very happy 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and well worth the Money!
customer_reviews.author: Katy woods

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Instructions not clear had to reassemble several time. Two person job. .Not much room fo older larger infants. Looks good when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, safe, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter. It was very easy to set up. It is very durable, and sturdy and it can be adjusted as they grow. The only thing I really don't like about it is the side cannot be lowered so it is not as easy to get the baby out. It is light weight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service form the factory
customer_reviews.text: I call the factory asked about the Extension bar with no answer
customer_reviews.author: Raid

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice for my little one!! I was weary at first, but after looking at the reviews we decided to try it. We are very satisfied and I am glad the product lived up to all its good reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Peter gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was brown. Does not match anything in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Widner

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Bedroom not very huge so this was definitely a great purchase. Very sturdy, fit room perfectly, all items to assemble were labeled clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ann Auguiste

customer_reviews.title: Mini crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this little crip it is perfect for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great little crib fit perfectly in my tiny space. I bought another mattress cause the one it brings is not a mattress it's like a pad and highly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Arcenia hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I had to write one about this crib. I love it! It's the perfect size and it was really easy to put together. The only thing I need to get now is a bumper that fits this crib because I don't think a regular size one would fit. I would definitely recommend this crib!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bravar

customer_reviews.title: No wheels so you have to lift it up.
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom is small but the crib is beautiful and my 3 months old likes it. I'm glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Duvert Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made, don’t regret one bit.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t to sure about buying a crib in amazon but reading a few of the other reviews and now actually setting up the crib and using it it’s actually really good easy to assemble and very sturdy best purchase I’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just make sure you don't get it wrong with the screws!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband about 2 hours, but the insteuctions were clear and precise! It looks great and fit perfectly in our tiny room. I’m so excited to see my princess in it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: So one of the wood pieces came with a split but we just glued it up and all is well. Very sturdy and a few height options, so happy for my back
customer_reviews.author: cassy l cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Crib
customer_reviews.text: Great little mini crib. Exactly what I wanted. Easy to assemble and fit perfectly in our small bedroom. No scratches or any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Teran

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bed and came to me in perfect condition without any damage or missing parts and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: adlan bashir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini-crib!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a growing baby that’s not yet ready for their bigger crib.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Rienzi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib, unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: The crib is absolutely beautiful! Works perfectly in the space!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good for value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, does dent/scratch very easily. Had to purchase a different mattress as the one it came with was really thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is very sturdy. Only problem is that the pieces don’t line up correctly on the ends
customer_reviews.author: Kyla McNeill

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib is so cute and better quality them I thought it was going to be for the price... it was easy to put together and the directions were simple
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Chambers

customer_reviews.title: We love this crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib, perfect mini size, not sure how much longer my son will fit in it since he is 98 percentile long, but will definitely fine till 1st year mark .
customer_reviews.author: nesar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a MUST!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is so cute and little! The perfect size for an add on to mom and dads room. Very sturdy! Definitely worth every penny. We love it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this crib. Perfect for my room
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Too small

product_meta.title: Dream On Me, Violet Mini Crib, Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:CherryThe Violet/Piper 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib is the perfect nursery solution for small spaces and to keep pace with the changing needs of your growing child. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately).Built of solid pinewood, the Violet/Piper attracts with a flowing and curvy design. Minimalist with a small footprint, it is ideal to make the most of small spaces or when you are co-sharing with your baby. You can choose from six pleasant finishes and create a stylish space for your child.The Violet/Piper has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting that you can adjust as your child grows. It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit.At Dream On Me we prioritize safety. All our cribs are JPMA certified and are tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet/exceed government and ASTM safety standards. Product dimensions are 42Lx25Wx36H inches. Maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.
feature_bullets: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: The Violet/Piper 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib keeps pace with your growing child. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately)

COMPACT DESIGN: Built of solid pinewood, it boasts a minimalist, flowing design. It occupies a small footprint, making it ideal for compact spaces or when you are co-sharing with your child. Choose from 6 pleasant finishes and design a chic space

MATTRESS MATTERS: The Violet/Piper has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting for adaptability. It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a DOM non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit
PRIORITIZING SAFETY: All our cribs are JPMA certified and are tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed applicable CPSC and ASTM safety standards
PRODUCT SPECS: Product dimensions are 42Lx25Wx36H inches. The maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included
